thread.title: Melbourne Storm v Gold Coast Titans, Newcastle Knights v Sydney Roosters: Live score, live updates, live blog in NRL round 22 2
thread.title_full: Melbourne Storm v Gold Coast Titans, Newcastle Knights v Sydney Roosters: Live score, live updates, live blog in NRL round 22 2 | The Advertiser

title: Melbourne Storm v Gold Coast Titans, Newcastle Knights v Sydney Roosters: Live score, live updates, live blog in NRL round 22 2
text:
THE Knights are on the bottom of the ladder and their biggest worry is avoiding the wooden spoon.
On the other hand, the Roosters have their eye on a top two spot in the next five games and a win today will boost their cause.
The Roosters have sidelined halfback Mitchell Pearce to give him a break before the finals series, with teenager Jackson Hastings to fill in.
Can the Knights strike while the Roosters are weak or will they collapse at the challenge?
Follow all the action in our live blog below!
Live Sunday NRL (Frame content direct link: http://embed.scribblelive.com/Embed/v7.aspx?Id=1421932&ThemeId=16707 .)
Originally published as Live: Hot Chooks blitzing sorry Knights
